description.en: The eldest daughter of the Order of Adoulin、 one of the Twelve Orders in the Sacred City of Adoulin. She is the princess of the nation. Her mysterious power to harmonize with the forest has resulted in her never being harmed by its creatures. She is sometimes ridiculed as a witch because of this、 but adventurers are touched by her kindness.
description.jp:
神聖アドゥリン都市同盟の十二名家の
ひとつ アドゥリン家の長女。
同盟国家の同盟主を務めている。
森と調和する不思議な力を秘めており 
森の魔物に傷つけられたことがないため
「魔女姫」と揶揄されることもあるが 
冒険者は彼女の優しさに
触れることになる。

name.jp: ナークアルヴェンジャンス

desc.en:
Recovers party's HP by 20% of MAX HP
8-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Deals split HP damage between all targets
Self: 3 turns [Heirloom]
desc.gl:
Slightly restores party's HP
8-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 3 turns Heirloom
desc.jp:
味方全員のHPを小回復
＋8HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に3ACTION「受け継いだ遺剣」付与

desc.jp: 受け継いだ遺剣：自身の最大BRV 攻撃力が上昇し 味方全員のBRVを一定量回復（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

name.jp: アセンション＆エクスパンジマジック

desc.en:
Cancels [Descension]
Self: 5 turns [Ascension]
Triggers [Expunge Magic]
　∟ 2-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack (20% per hit)
　∟ Deals split HP damage between all targets
　∟ Recovers party's HP by 50% of HP damage dealt (limit 20% of Max HP)
　∟ Target: Removes all buffs
　∟ Self: 3 turns [Fast Cast]

While [Ascension] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+ (Ascension)]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 40% of Initial BRV
　∟ Magic BRV attack (BRV potency 100%)
　∟ Self: 2 turns [Fast Cast]
• [HP Attack] becomes [Harmonic Displacement]
　∟ 3-HIT magic BRV attack + HP attack (20% per hit)
　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt
　∟ Self: 2 turns [Fast Cast]
desc.gl:
2-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Moderately restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 20% of individual MAX HP
Removes all buffs from targets
Self: 5 turns Ascension buff; 3 turns Fast Cast
Cancels Descension buff
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Ascension), HP Attack becomes Harmonic Displacement while Ascension buff active
desc.jp:
2HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
与えるHPダメージは分配
与えたHPダメージに応じて味方全員のHP中回復
回復量の上限は それぞれの最大HPの20％分
対象の強化効果を全て解除
自身に5ACTION強化効果「アセンション」
3ACTION「ファストキャスト」付与
強化効果「デセンション」解除
強化効果「アセンション」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が「BRV攻撃＋（アセンション）」に
通常「HP攻撃」が「ハーモニックディスプレイスメント」に変化
